participant_1.background:
I love eating my mom's cooking because it reminds me of home.
I am a reliable and hardworking individual who enjoys spending time with my family and friends, but also values alone time to relax.
I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin.
i like to exercise.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.
I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital.
i am a small business owner.
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What's up?
Not much, just looking for a new place to move.
Oh cool, I'm actually doing the same thing.
Really? Where are you thinking of moving to?
I'm not sure yet. I'm looking for a place with a climate that's better for my skin.
That's a good idea. I'm looking for a place that's close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.
Haha, that's a good idea too. I'm also looking for a place that's close to my family and friends.
That's important. I'm looking for a place that's close to my mom's house so I can visit her often.
That's sweet. What do you do for a living?
I'm a small business owner.
Oh cool, what kind of business?
I have a bakery.
Oh nice! I love going to bakeries.
Me too! I love baking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.
That's awesome! I love to cook too.
We should cook together sometime!
I would love that!
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
